name: Derelict (itch) (Peanut Panda)
description:
In 2017, an unknown interstellar object entered the solar system. We are not sure where it came from, but preliminary analysis indicates that the object is not a natural formation.

An expedition has been launched to set up a First Contact event with the vessel.

Eight years later, a space station from Earth is ready to dock with the unknown entity ...

A point-and-click adventure game made for Themed Horror Game Jam #6 - itch.io
